description.en-US:
1. You can participate in this activity if you have EOS. The minimum starting amount is 10 EOS.

2. This product has fixed lending period. You won&s;t be able to withdraw before maturity.

3. Your principal and EOS interest will be distributed to your wealth management account after maturity.

4. The product in EOS mining pool has an exit period of 3 days. You will not receive any profit during the exit period.

5.No management fee will be charged for this product.
description.zh-CN:
1、您持有 EOS 即可参加本活动，最小起投金额：10 EOS。

2、本矿池是周期固定、收益固定的币本位保本保收益型理财产品。

3、本矿池如果选择复投，您的收益将每月结算一次，本金将不会退回到您的账户中，自动复投到下个周期，如果您选择取消复投，本金将在本周期结束后退回到您的账户中。

3、您的本金及 EOS 收益会在到期后统一发放到您的理财账户。

4、本矿池退出周期为 3 天且退出期间无收益。

5、本矿池不收取管理费用。

description.en-US:
1.To invest in DrEE Mining Pool, you need to deposit DrEE. The minimum deposit amount is 100 DrEE, and the deposit amount must be a multiple of 100 DrEE.

2. This product has fixed lending period. You won&s;t be able to withdraw before maturity.

3. The expected annualized rate of return for this product is 24%.

4. No management fee will be charged for this product.
description.zh-CN:
1、本矿池为「存 DrEE 得 DrEE」，您持有 DrEE 即可参加，最小起投金额为 100 DrEE 且投资金额必须是 100 DrEE 的整数倍。

2、您参加的是固定周期产品，中途不可退出。

3、您的本金及 DrEE 收益会在到期后统一发放到您的理财账户。

4、本产品年化收益率 24％。

5、本矿池不收取管理费用。

description.en-US:
1. User can participate in this mining pool by holding ETH, and the minimum investment amount is 0.1 ETH.

2. The return rate of this mining pool is 4.9% ~ 21.6% floating return, and the specific income will be subjected to the actual income.

3. Special note: This mining pool cannot be withdrawn at any time (this rule is set by the Ethereum mainnet lock-up rule).

4. Withdrawal rules will be unlocked based on the official release of Ethereum or the liquidity of locked tokens will be considered later based on actual conditions.

5. The mining pool will charge 10% of the mining revenue as a service fee, and other revenue will be distributed to users.

6. The income of this mining pool will be airdropped to the user‘s spot account after we receive the income from the main network.
description.zh-CN:
1、您持有 ETH 即可参与本矿池，最小起投额度是 0.1 ETH。

2、本矿池的收益率为 4.9%~21.6% 浮动收益，具体以收到的收益为准。

3、特别说明：本矿池为定期矿池不可随时退出(该规则由以太坊主网锁仓规则设定)。

4、退出规则将根据以太坊官方释放情况解锁，视市场情况考虑释放锁仓代币的流动性。

5、本矿池将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为服务费，其他收益将全部发放给用户。

6、本矿池的收益将在我们收到主网发放的收益后发放到您的账户。

7、本矿池锁仓周期较长，详情请查看公告。

8、Eth2更多信息可查看：Eth2 官网

name.zh-CN: EOS DFS(大丰收) 机枪池

description.en-US:
1. This mining pool is dedicated to DeFi wealth management.

2. This mining pool is an EOS DFS smart pool, "Deposit EOS to Get EOS".

3. Users holding EOS will be able to participate. The minimum initial investment amount is 10 EOS, user can choose to reinvest the principal when participating, otherwise the principal will be automatically returned to your wealth management account after the product expires in 30 days.

4. All coins mined in this mining pool will be sold in time, and this part of the proceeds will be issued in the form of EOS once a week, and it will be issued to your spot account in the form of airdrop.

5. The platform will collect 10% of the mining revenue as the service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to users.

6. Risk warning, BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1. 本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财，本矿池的收益率为浮动收益，每周结算一次。

3. 本矿池为 EOS DFS(大丰收) 机枪池，「存 EOS 得 EOS」。

4. 您持有 EOS 即可参加，最小起投金额为 10 EOS ，参与时可选择本金复投，否则 30天产品到期后本金将自动退回到您的理财账户。

5. 本矿池挖出的所有币将会及时卖出，该部分收益将以 EOS 的形式发放，本矿池收益每周发放一次，会以空投的形式发放到您的现货账户。

6. 平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

7.本矿池的退出周期为 4 天。

8. 风险提示，BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

description.en-US:
1. To invest in DeFi Smart Pool, you need to deposit BTC. In return, you will earn BTC.

2. You can participate if you hold BTC, and the minimum investment amount is 0.01 BTC.

3. The coins mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of BTC.

4. This mining pool will charge a 0.6% fee.

5. The platform will charge 10% of the mining income as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.

6. Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1. 本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2. 本矿池为 BTC DeFi 机枪池，「存 BTC 得 BTC」。

3. 您持有 BTC 即可参加，最小起投金额为 0.01 BTC 。

4. 注意：本矿池将在您退出的时候收取 0.6% 的 BTC 与 WBTC 之间的互换手续费用，未参与用户请参与「BTC 机枪池 2(原Curve矿池)」。

5. 本矿池挖出的代币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 BTC 的形式发放。

6. 平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

7.若该矿池后期挖矿币种调整，将另行通知。

8. 退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

9. 风险提示，该流动性挖矿产品为创新型数字货币金融衍生品，风险较大。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

description.en-US:
1. You can participate in this activity if you have EOS. The minimum starting amount is 10 EOS.
2. This product has fixed lending period. You won&s;t be able to withdraw before maturity.
3. Your principal and EOS interest will be distributed to your wealth management account after maturity.
4. The product in EOS mining pool has an exit period of 3 days. You will not receive any profit during the exit period.
5.No management fee will be charged for this product.
description.ko-KR:
1. EOS가 있는 경우 이 활동에 참여할 수 있습니다. 최소 모집 금액은 10 EOS입니다.
2. 본 상품은 렌딩 기간이 정해져 있습니다. 만기 전에는 철회가 불가능합니다.
3. 원금과 EOS 수익은 만기 후 재테크 계정으로 일괄 지급됩니다.
4. 본 마이닝 풀의 상품은 3일의 철회 기간을 가지며 철회 기간 동안은 수익이 없습니다.
5. 본 상품에 대한 별도의 관리 수수료가 부과되지 않습니다.
description.zh-CN:
1、您持有 EOS 即可参加本活动，最小起投金额：10 EOS。

2、本矿池是周期固定、收益固定的币本位保本保收益型理财产品。

2、您参加的是固定周期产品，中途不可退出。

3、您的本金及 EOS 收益会在到期后统一发放到您的理财账户。

4、本矿池退出周期为 3 天且退出期间无收益。

5、本矿池不收取管理费用。

1、您持有 GXC 即可参加本活动，最小起投金额：20 GXC；
2、若您参加的是活期产品，您的收益会在您退出本活动后，统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；若您参加的是固定周期产品，您的收益，会在活动到期后，统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；
3、若您参加的是活期产品，退出周期为 3 天且退出期间无收益；若您参加的是30 天、90 天固定周期产品，中途退出，您获得的收益会按照活期收益计算，退出周期为 3 天且退出期间无收益；若您参加的是 180 天产品，未到期，不可退出！
4、历史参考年化收益率为：2~9%（仅为参考），您的最终收益以实际的节点运行收益为准；

1. To invest in DeFi Smart Pool, you need to deposit BTC. In return, you will earn BTC.

2. You can participate if you hold BTC, and the minimum investment amount is 0.01 BTC.

3. The coins mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of BTC.

4. The platform will charge 10% of the mining income as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.

5. Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.

2. 本矿池为 BTC DeFi 机枪池 2(原 BTC Curve 流动性挖矿)，「存 BTC 得 BTC」。

3. 您持有 BTC 即可参加，最小起投金额为 0.01 BTC 。

4. 本矿池挖出的代币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 BTC 的形式发放。

5. 平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

6.若该矿池后期挖矿币种调整，将另行通知。

7. 退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

8. 风险提示，该流动性挖矿产品为创新型数字货币金融衍生品，风险较大。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

name.zh-CN: BTC 机枪池 2 挖矿活期

description.en-US:
1.To invest in ANG Mining Pool, you need to deposit ANG. The minimum deposit amount is 500 ANG, and the deposit amount must be a multiple of 500 ANG.
2.90-day product will receive 20% Anabot&s;s profit，180-day product will receive 30% Anabot&s;s profit，360-day product will receive 40% Anabot&s;s profit.
3. This product has fixed lending period. You won&s;t be able to withdraw before maturity.
4. The expected annualized rate of return for this product is 36.5%.
5. No management fee will be charged for this product.
description.ko-KR:
1.ANG 재테크에 투자하기 위해는 ANG 입금이 필요합니다. 최소 단위는 500ANG로, 500의 배수 단위로 참여하실 수 있습니다.
2.90일 상품의 경우 애너봇 수익의 20%, 180일 상품의 경우 애너봇 수익의 30%, 360일 상품의 경우 애너봇 수익의 40%를 받게됩니다.
3.본 상품은 재테크 상품으로, 투자 기간 동안 철회가 불가능합니다.
4.본 재테크 상품의 기대 연수익률은 36.5%입니다.
5.본 재테크 상품은 별도의 수수료가 부과되지 않습니다.
description.zh-CN:
1、本矿池为「存 ANG 得 ANG」，您持有 ANG 即可参加，最小起投金额为 500 ANG 且投资金额必须是 500 ANG 的整数倍。
2、90 天产品可获得 Anabot 收益的 20%，180天产品可获得 Anabot 收益的 30%，360天产品可获得 Anabot 收益的 40%。
3、您参加的是固定周期产品，中途不可退出。
4、您的本金及 ANG 收益会在到期后统一发放到您的理财账户。
5、本产品预计年化收益率 36.5％。
6、本矿池不收取管理费用。

1、您持有 EOS 即可参加本活动，最小起投金额：10 EOS；
2、若您参加的是活期产品，您的收益会在您退出本活动后，统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；若您参加的是固定周期产品，您的收益，会在活动到期后，统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；
3、本矿池的所有产品，退出周期为 3 天且退出期间无收益；固定周期产品，中途退出，您获得的收益会按照活期收益计算；
4、历史参考年化收益率为：1%~4.5%（仅为参考），您的最终收益以实际的节点运行收益为准；

name.zh-CN: ETH DeFi 宇宙最强机枪池

description.en-US: 1.To invest in ETH DeFi Smart Pool, you need to deposit ETH. In return, you will earn USDT. 2.You can participate if you hold ETH, and the minimum investment amount is 0.1 ETH.3.The coins mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of USDT.4.The platform will charge 10% of the mining income as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.5.Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1. 本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2. 本矿池为 ETH DeFi 机枪池挖矿，「存 ETH 得 USDT」。

3. 您持有 ETH 即可参加，最小起投金额为 0.1 ETH。

4. 本矿池挖出的币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 USDT 的形式发放。

5. 平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

6. 退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

7. 风险提示，该流动性挖矿产品为创新型数字货币金融衍生品，风险较大。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

name.zh-CN: ETH 宇宙最强机枪池活期

description.en-US:
1. You can participate in this mining pool if you hold DOT. The minimum amount of Deposit DOT Get DOT is 1 DOT.

2. You are participating in flexible-term product, your principal and income will be distributed directly to your wealth management account after you exit.

3. The exit period of the mining pool is 28 days and there is no profit within the period(the exit period is set according to the unlock period of Polkadot mainnet).

4. The annualized income for the first month of the mining pool product will be 12%, and it will be adjusted to the actual income of the mining pool.

5.No service fee will be chanrged within this mining pool.
description.zh-CN:
1、您持有 DOT 即可参加本矿池，本产品「存 DOT 得 DOT」最小起投数量：1 DOT。

2、您参加的是活期产品，您的本金和收益会在您退出本产品后，统一发放到您的理财账户。

3、本矿池退出周期为 28 天且退出期间无收益（退出周期是根据波卡主网解锁期设定）。

4、本矿池产品首月的年化收益为 12%，之后会根据矿池实际收益调整。

5、本矿池不收取管理费用。

description.en-US:
1. You can participate in this 「Deposit BIUT for BIUT and BIU」to get interest if you have BIUT. The minimum amount to participate in is 1,000 BIUT. The total amount to participate in for our users is 10,000,000 BIUT.
2. In the first round of voting, the 10,000 BIUT obtained by the top 100 users who voted for BIUT 100,000 ONE will be automatically deposited into the pool for 125 days before the end of the preparatory period, and will receive double income from BIUT and BIU.
3. The 10,000 BIUT for the first 100 users who voted 100k ONE for BIUT will be deposited into this PoS mining pool product, getting BIUT and BIU as interest.
4. The interest of this mining pool product is mainly from the block reward after the node runs stably. The block reward is in positive relation with the pledge amount. The ultimate interest depends on the pledge amount of our running node.
5. You can’t exit before the product term is over! Your principal and profits will be deposited into your account after the product term is over. The platform will charge 10% of your profits as the management fee.
description.zh-CN:
1、本活动为「存 BIUT 得 BIUT 和 BIU」，您持有 BIUT 即可参加，最小起投金额：1000 BIUT；本产品总额度：10,000,000 BIUT；
2、首期投票上币中，给 BIUT 投票 100,000 ONE 的前 100 名用户所获得的 10,000 BIUT，将于筹备期结束前将自动存入至矿池 125 天产品，并获得 BIUT 和 BIU 双重收益；
3、本产品的收益，主要来源于节点稳定运行后的出块奖励，出块奖励与质押数量成正比，最终收益将由平台运行节点的实际质押数量而定；
4、本活动，未到期，不可退出！您的 BIUT 和 BIU 收益会在活动到期后统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；
5、本活动 125 天的产品硬顶为 500 万 BIUT，180 天产品的硬顶额度为 500 万 BIUT。

description.en-US:
1. This mining pool is ETH Worklock mining, "locked-up ETH & Mine NU", the minimum starting amount: 0.1 ETH.

2. The mining pool has a fixed period of 180 days (calculated from the start of the network launching).

3. The mining pool will start operation after the official network is launched, and it will be in the fundraising period before then.

4. The return rate of this mining pool product is based on the actual currency received.

5. After the expiration of the mining pool, the exit period is 2 days and there is no profit during the exit period.

6. Exit and arrival time: Coins withdrawn before 8:00AM are expected to arrive at 8:30AM the next day, and coins withdrawn after 8:00AM are expected to arrive at 8:30AM in the morning of the third day. (GMT+8)

7. The mining pool will charge 10% of the mining revenue as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.

8. Risk reminder, please consider various factors such as project popularity, market trends, and your own risk tolerance, prudently decide whether to participate, and allocate your assets reasonably. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1、本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2、本矿池为 ETH 锁仓挖矿，「锁仓 ETH 获得 NU」，最小起投数量：0.1 ETH。

3、本矿池为固定周期 180 天（从网络启动开始计算）。

4、本矿池参与时间截止到 9 月 28 日 18:00(UTC+8)。

5、本矿池将会在官方网络运行后开启运行，在此之前将处于募集期。

6、本矿池到期后本金退回周期为 2 天。

7、退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 8:30 到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 8:30 到账。

8、BigONE 将为用户运行节点，本矿池收取 10% 的 WorkLock NU 代币费用，托管的 ETH 不收取任何费用。

9、风险提示，请您从项目热度、市场趋势、自身风险承受能力等各方面因素考虑，审慎地决定是否参与，并合理地配置自己的资产。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

name.zh-CN: USDT DeFi 宇宙最强机枪池

In return, you will earn USDT. 2.You can participate if you hold USDT, and the minimum investment amount is 100 USDT.3.The coins mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of USDT.4.The platform will charge 10% of the mining income as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.5.Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.

3. 您持有 USDT 即可参加，最小起投金额为 100 USDT 。

4. 本矿池挖出的币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 USDT 的形式发放。

5. 平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

6. 退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

7. 风险提示，该流动性挖矿产品为创新型数字货币金融衍生品，风险较大。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

name.zh-CN: USDT 宇宙最强机枪池活期

description.en-US:
1.To invest in CPS Mining Pool, you need to deposit CPS. The minimum deposit amount is 1000 CPS, and the deposit amount must be a multiple of 1000 CPS.
2.This product has a 180-day fixed lending period. You won&s;t be able to withdraw before maturity.
3. The expected annualized rate of return for this product is 20.27%.
4. No management fee will be charged for this product.
description.ko-KR:
1.CPS 재테크에 투자하기 위해는 CPS 입금이 필요합니다. 최소 단위는 1000CPS로, 1000의 배수 단위로 참여하실 수 있습니다.
2.본 상품은 180일 재테크 상품으로, 투자 기간 동안 철회가 불가능합니다.
3.본 재테크 상품의 기대 연수익률은 20.27%입니다.
4.본 재테크 상품은 별도의 수수료가 부과되지 않습니다.
description.zh-CN:
1、本矿池为「存 CPS 得 CPS」，您持有 CPS 即可参加，最小起投金额为 1000 CPS 且投资金额必须是 1000 CPS 的整数倍。
2、您参加的是 180 天固定周期产品，中途不可退出。
3、您的本金及 CPS 收益会在到期后统一发放到您的理财账户。
4、本产品预计年化收益率 20.27 ％。
5、本矿池不收取管理费用。

description.en-US:
1.To invest in DeFi Smart Pool, you need to deposit USDC. In return, you will earn USDT. 

2.You can participate if you hold USDC, and the minimum investment amount is 100 USDC.

3.The coins mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of USDT.

4.The platform will charge 10% of the mining income as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.

5.Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1. 本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2. 本矿池为「USDC DeFi 机枪池」，「存 USDC 得 USDT」。

3. 您持有 USDC 即可参加，最小起投金额为 100 USDC 。

4. 本矿池挖出的币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 USDT 的形式发放。

5. 平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

6. 退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

7. 风险提示，该流动性挖矿产品为创新型数字货币金融衍生品，风险较大。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

1、您持有 QTUM 即可参加本活动，最小起投金额：10 QTUM ；
2、若您参加的是活期产品，您的收益会在您退出本活动后，统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；若您参加的是固定周期产品，您的收益，会在活动到期后，统一到账，且平台会收取您收益的 10% 作为管理费用；
3、本矿池的所有产品，退出周期为 7 天且退出期间无收益；固定周期产品，中途退出，您获得的收益会按照活期收益计算；
4、历史参考年化收益率为：1%~6%（仅为参考），您的最终收益以实际的节点运行收益为准；

description.en-US:
1. This mining pool is dedicated to DeFi wealth-management.

2. This mining pool is exclusive train called ONE Harmony - Old Pal Premium. Eligible users can participate, "Save ONE and get ONE".

3. You can participate by holding ONE. The minimum investment amount is 10,000 ONE, and the personal investment limit is 1 million ONE.

4. For the ONE participating in this mining pool, we will allocate funds to mine. The allocation ratio is 10000 ONE = 20 USDT.

5. The mining revenue of this mining pool will be fully converted into ONE in the secondary market, 50% of revenue will be distributed to participating users and remaining 50% will be directly destroyed.

6. The token mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of ONE.

7. Withdrawal arrival time: Token withdrawn before 8:00AM are expected to arrive around next 9:00AM, and token withdrawn after 8:00AM are expected to arrive around 9:00AM a day after.

8. This mining pool does not charge service fees.
description.zh-CN:
1. 本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2. 本矿池为 ONE 和谐号-老铁专列，符合条件的用户可以参与，「存 ONE 得 ONE」。

3. 您持有 ONE 即可参加，最小起投金额为 10000 ONE，个人投资上限 100万 ONE 。

4.本矿池参与的 ONE 我们将进行配资去挖矿，配资比例 10000 ONE= 20 USDT。

5.本矿池的挖矿收益将在二级市场全部兑换成 ONE，其中 50% 发放给参与用户，50% 直接销毁。

6. 本矿池挖出的币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 ONE 的形式发放。

7.本矿池参与条件：截止到 9 月 9 日 00:00( UTC+8 )之前的 90 天，持仓始终 ≥ 100万 ONE，并通过平台进阶认证。

8. 退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

9. 本矿池不收取服务费。

In return, you will earn USDT. 2.You can participate if you hold TRX, and the minimum investment amount is 1000 TRX.3.The coins mined by this mining pool will be sold in a timely manner to lock in revenue, and this part of the revenue will be issued in the form of USDT.4.The platform will charge 10% of the mining income as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.5.Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1、本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2、本矿池为 TRX DeFi 机枪池挖矿，「存 TRX 得 USDT」。

3、您持有 TRX 即可参加，最小起投金额为 1000 TRX 。

4、本矿池挖出的币将会及时卖出锁定收益，该部分收益将以 USDT 的形式发放。

5、平台将收取挖矿收益的 10% 作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。

6、目前该矿池已投入去 SUN ，根据官方规则，14天内不可退出。

7、退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 9:00 左右到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 9:00 左右到账。

8、风险提示，该流动性挖矿产品为创新型数字货币金融衍生品，风险较大。BigONE 不承担合约漏洞、项目方跑路等第三方不可控风险带来的资产损失。

name.zh-CN: 波卡生态 Plasm 矿池

description.en-US:
1. This mining pool is the Polkadot ecological project Plasm lock-up mining, PLM by depositing ETH, the minimum amount of investment: 0.1 ETH.

2.You are participating in a fixed-term product, which means that you can get different weights in different periods, and the benefits will be different. Income calculation method: PLM obtained quantity=0.4×ETH quantity×ETH price×weight (coefficient).

3. The return rate of this mining pool product is subject to the actual currency received.

4. The exit period of this mining pool is 2 days and there is no income during the exit period. The income will be distributed to your spot account in the form of airdrop within 7 working days after your product expires.

5.The mining pool will charge 10% of the mining revenue as a platform service fee, and the remaining part will be distributed to participating users.

6.Risk warning, this liquid mining product is an innovative digital currency financial derivative, which is relatively risky. BigONE does not bear the loss of assets caused by third-party uncontrollable risks such as contract vulnerabilities and project team running away.
description.zh-CN:
1、本矿池为 DeFi 专区理财。

2、本矿池为波卡生态项目 Plasm 锁仓挖矿，「存 ETH 得 PLM」，最小起投数量：0.1 ETH。

3、您参加的是固定周期产品，不同的周期可以得到不同的权重，收益也会不同。收益计算方式：PLM 获得数量=0.4×ETH 数量×ETH 价格×权重（系数）。

4、本矿池产品的收益率以实际收到的币为准。

5、本矿池退出周期为 2 天且退出期间无收益，收益将会在您的产品到期后的 7 个工作日内以空投的形式发放到您的现货账户。

6、退出到账时间：8:00（UTC+8)前退出的币，预计第二日 8:30 到账，8:00 之后退出的币，预计第三天早上 8:30 到账。

7、本矿池将收取挖矿收益的 10 % ，作为平台服务费，剩余部分将发放给参与用户。
